Traffic For Excite Others Down

26 Jul 1999

The big portal players are losing more of their audience, as Andover News is reporting.

\nExcite Web traffic is down almost 20% over the last month, with some other portals losing people as well. Anyone else think that people are using big portals less and less these days?
